alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 12:40PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hartford, southwestern Hampshire and western Hampden Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1239 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blandford, or 13 miles northwest of Westfield, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Westfield, Granby, Southwick, Huntington, Hartland, Russell, Granville, Chester, Blandford, Montgomery and Tolland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.
